tables.name: osmosis_arbitrage_trades
tables.description: This table contains information about arbitrage trades in the Cosmos ecosystem,                    providing insights into the execution of these trades and their associated profits.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the arbitrage trade was executed.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block in which the arbitrage trade was executed.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the transaction in which the arbitrage trade was executed.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction that executed the arbitrage trade.

columns.name: exec_msg_index
columns.description: The index of the execute message within the transaction that executed the arbitrage trade.

columns.name: arb_index
columns.description: A unique index for the arbitrage trade, allowing for the tracking of multiple trades.

columns.name: trader
columns.description: The wallet address of the trader who executed the arbitrage trade.

columns.name: amount_in
columns.description: The amount of tokens or coins that were input into the arbitrage trade.

columns.name: amount_out
columns.description: The amount of tokens or coins that were output from the arbitrage trade.

columns.name: arbitraged_token
columns.description: The token or coin that was being arbitrated, or exchanged between pools.

columns.name: profit
columns.description: The profit made by the trader from executing the arbitrage trade.

columns.name: roi
columns.description: The return on investment (ROI) for the trader from executing the arbitrage trade.

columns.name: pool_path
columns.description: The path of pools that the arbitrage trade traversed, including the input and output pools.

columns.name: n_hops
columns.description: The number of hops, or transactions, that the arbitrage trade involved.

columns.name: n_pools
columns.description: The number of pools that the arbitrage trade involved.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: osmosis_asset_denoms
tables.description: This table, asset_denoms, contains a comprehensive list of token denominations from various blockchains in the Cosmos ecosystem. It provides essential information to identify and classify different tokens.

columns.name: chain_name
columns.description: Name of the blockchain where the token is native.

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: Token denomination as defined in the blockchain's code.

columns.name: token_name
columns.description: Friendly display name of the token.

columns.name: token_symbol
columns.description: Symbol used to represent the token.

columns.name: token_display
columns.description: Display representation of the token, often including its symbol and denomination.

columns.name: token_exponent
columns.description: Exponent used to display the token's value with proper decimal precision.

columns.name: coingecko_id
columns.description: Unique ID assigned to the token on CoinGecko.

columns.name: native_chain_name
columns.description: Name of the blockchain where the token is native, potentially different from the chain_name.

columns.name: native_denom
columns.description: Token denomination in its native blockchain.

columns.name: token_origin
columns.description: Source or origin of the token, including any relevant information about its creation.

columns.name: last_refresh
columns.description: Date and time when the data for this token was last updated.

columns.name: ingestion_date
columns.description: Date and time when the data for this token was ingested into the system.

columns.name: is_gov_token
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the token is a governance token or not.

columns.name: source
columns.description: Source of the data for this token, such as a specific blockchain or API.

tables.name: osmosis_block_events
tables.description: This table provides a detailed record of all events that occurred on the Cosmos blockchain, including block height, timestamp, and event type. It offers a comprehensive view of the blockchain's activity and evolution.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in the blockchain, uniquely identifying each block.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block was created on the blockchain.

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: The index of the event within the block.

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: The type of event that occurred, which can be used to categorize and analyze the data.

columns.name: event_attributes
columns.description: Additional attributes related to the event, providing more context and information.

columns.name: source
columns.description: The source of the data, indicating which blockchain or node provided the information.

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: The version of the schema used to structure and organize the data.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: osmosis_blocks
tables.description: This table contains information about blocks in the Cosmos blockchain ecosystem, providing insights into block heights, timestamps, and other relevant metrics.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in the blockchain, indicating its position in the chain.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block was created, measured in seconds since the Unix epoch.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the Cosmos blockchain network, distinguishing it from other networks.

columns.name: proposer_address
columns.description: The address of the validator that proposed the block for inclusion in the blockchain.

columns.name: validators_hash
columns.description: A hash of the validators that participated in the block's validation process.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block data was ingested into the system, measured in seconds since the Unix epoch.

columns.name: messages_bytes
columns.description: The total number of bytes in all the messages (transactions) included in the block.

columns.name: tx_count
columns.description: The total number of transactions (messages) included in the block.

tables.name: osmosis_delegate
tables.description: This table provides a comprehensive view of transactions and actions within the Cosmos ecosystem, including block height, timestamps, and token-related activities.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The current height of the block in the blockchain.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block was created.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: A unique identifier for the transaction.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the account that initiated the transaction.

columns.name: validator
columns.description: The validator responsible for processing the transaction.

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens transferred or exchanged.

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the token (e.g., ATOM, UST).

columns.name: new_shares
columns.description: The newly minted or exchanged shares.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: osmosis_event_attributes
tables.description: This table provides information about blockchain events from the Cosmos ecosystem, including metadata and attribute values. It is useful for analyzing and understanding event data in the Cosmos network.

columns.name: deprecated_warning
columns.description: Indicates if the field is deprecated or not

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in the blockchain

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: The ID of the blockchain

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block was created

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: The ID of the transaction

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: The index of the event within the transaction

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: The type of the event

columns.name: event_source
columns.description: The source of the event

columns.name: attribute_key
columns.description: The key of the attribute value

columns.name: attribute_value
columns.description: The value of the attribute

columns.name: attribute_index
columns.description: The index of the attribute within the event

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested

tables.name: osmosis_ibc_transfer_delays
tables.description: This table tracks transfer delays in the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into the time it takes for transactions to be confirmed across different blockchains. By analyzing these delays, users can better understand the performance of the network and identify potential areas for improvement.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the transaction.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block where the transaction was initially included.

columns.name: ack_block_height
columns.description: The height of the block where the transaction was acknowledged or confirmed.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the sender who initiated the transaction.

columns.name: tx_delay
columns.description: The time difference between the transaction being included in a block and its acknowledgement.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block where the transaction was initially included.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: osmosis_ics20_acknowledgement
tables.description: This table contains acknowledgements from ICS20 channels in the Cosmos ecosystem. It provides information about block heights, timestamps, and channel connections.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The block height at which the acknowledgement was recorded.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the block was created.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique identifier of the transaction that triggered the acknowledgement.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction in the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message in the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action in the message.

columns.name: src_channel
columns.description: The source ICS20 channel that sent the acknowledgement.

columns.name: dst_channel
columns.description: The destination ICS20 channel that received the acknowledgement.

columns.name: connection
columns.description: The connection ID of the ICS20 channel.

columns.name: sequence
columns.description: The sequence number of the acknowledgement.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: osmosis_ics20_receive
tables.description: This table captures information about ICS-20 receive transactions within the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into token transfer activities across the network. It includes key details about the transactions, such as sender and receiver addresses, token denominations, and transfer amounts.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transaction was included.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block containing the transaction was created.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: A unique identifier for the transaction, assigned by the blockchain.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the account that initiated the transaction.

columns.name: receiver
columns.description: The address of the account that received the tokens.

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens transferred during the transaction.

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the tokens transferred, typically a cosmos-native token.

columns.name: token_path
columns.description: A path representing the token transfer, including any intermediate denominations.

columns.name: memo
columns.description: A note or comment attached to the transaction by the sender.

columns.name: src_channel
columns.description: The source channel of the transaction.

columns.name: dst_channel
columns.description: The destination channel of the transaction.

columns.name: connection
columns.description: The connection identifier associated with the transaction.

columns.name: sequence
columns.description: The sequence number of the transaction within the channel.

columns.name: ack
columns.description: An acknowledgment flag indicating whether the transaction was successfully processed.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the transaction data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: osmosis_ics20_transfer
tables.description: This table contains information about ICS-20 transfers in the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into token transfers between different accounts and channels.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transfer occurred.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block in which the transfer occurred.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique identifier of the transaction in which the transfer occurred.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transfer within the transaction.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message in which the transfer occurred.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message in which the transfer occurred.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The account that initiated the transfer.

columns.name: receiver
columns.description: The account that received the transfer.

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens transferred.

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the token transferred.

columns.name: token_path
columns.description: The path of the token transfer, including any intermediary channels.

columns.name: memo
columns.description: Any additional information provided with the transfer.

columns.name: src_channel
columns.description: The source channel of the transfer.

columns.name: dst_channel
columns.description: The destination channel of the transfer.

columns.name: connection
columns.description: The connection through which the transfer occurred.

columns.name: sequence
columns.description: The sequence number of the transfer, used for ordering and consistency.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the transfer data was ingested into the database.

tables.name: osmosis_ics20_transfer_delays
tables.description: This table contains a collection of transfer delays related to the Inter-Chain Service 20 (ICS20) protocol within the Cosmos ecosystem. It provides valuable insights into the timing and performance of cross-chain transfers.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: Hash of the transaction that triggered the transfer delay.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Height of the block where the delayed transfer was recorded.

columns.name: ack_block_height
columns.description: Height of the block where the delayed transfer was acknowledged or resolved.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: Address of the sender involved in the delayed transfer.

columns.name: tx_delay
columns.description: Duration between the expected and actual transfer completion time.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the block containing the delayed transfer was created.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the transfer delay data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: osmosis_lock_tokens
tables.description: Lock Tokens table provides information on tokens locked in various pools within the Cosmos ecosystem, detailing the block height and timestamp when the lock was created.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in the Cosmos blockchain where the lock was created.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block in the Cosmos blockchain where the lock was created.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the transaction that created the lock.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction that created the lock.

columns.name: nth_action
columns.description: The action index of the lock creation, denoting the order of the lock within the transaction.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the sender who created the lock.

columns.name: pool_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the pool where the tokens are locked.

columns.name: amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens locked in the pool.

columns.name: period_lock_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the lock period.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the lock data was ingested into the database.

tables.name: osmosis_lp_cl_create_position
tables.description: This table contains information about liquidity pool creation positions on the Cosmos blockchain, providing insights into liquidity provision and market activity. The data is sourced from various Cosmos- based blockchains.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block that contains the transaction.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block that contains the transaction.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction that created the position.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction in the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the account that created the position.

columns.name: token_amount_0
columns.description: The amount of token 0 that was used to create the position.

columns.name: token_amount_1
columns.description: The amount of token 1 that was used to create the position.

columns.name: pool_id
columns.description: The identifier of the liquidity pool that the position was created in.

columns.name: position_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the position.

columns.name: lower_tick
columns.description: The lower tick value of the position.

columns.name: upper_tick
columns.description: The upper tick value of the position.

columns.name: liquidity
columns.description: The total liquidity of the position.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: osmosis_lp_cl_withdraw_position
tables.description: This table contains information about liquidity pool positions withdrawn from cross-chain liquidity pools in the Cosmos ecosystem. It provides insights into the withdrawn positions, including the tokens involved, the liquidity pool and position details, and the related events from the blockchain.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in the Cosmos blockchain where the transaction was processed.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block was processed in the Cosmos blockchain.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: A unique identifier for the transaction containing the position withdrawal information.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the position withdrawal transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction that contains the position withdrawal information.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message that contains the position withdrawal information.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the account that initiated the position withdrawal.

columns.name: token_amount_0
columns.description: The amount of the first token involved in the position withdrawal.

columns.name: token_amount_1
columns.description: The amount of the second token involved in the position withdrawal.

columns.name: pool_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the liquidity pool from which the position was withdrawn.

columns.name: position_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the position that was withdrawn.

columns.name: lower_tick
columns.description: The lower tick value of the position that was withdrawn.

columns.name: upper_tick
columns.description: The upper tick value of the position that was withdrawn.

columns.name: liquidity
columns.description: The liquidity associated with the position that was withdrawn.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the position withdrawal information was ingested into the database.

tables.name: osmosis_lp_gamm_exit_pool
tables.description: This table contains information about liquidity pools in the Cosmos ecosystem that have exited, providing insights into the dynamics of liquidity provision and withdrawal. The data is sourced from blockchain events within the Cosmos ecosystem.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transaction occurred.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block in which the transaction occurred, indicating when the exit event happened.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: A unique identifier for the transaction that triggered the exit event, allowing for the tracking of the transaction's status.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block, providing a hierarchical view of the transaction's position.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction, offering a detailed view of the transaction's components.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message, allowing for a fine-grained understanding of the transaction's actions.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the account that initiated the exit event, revealing the identity of the liquidity provider.

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens withdrawn from the liquidity pool during the exit event, providing insight into the transaction's volume.

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the tokens withdrawn, specifying the type of token involved in the transaction.

columns.name: pool_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the liquidity pool that was exited, allowing for the tracking of the pool's status.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system, providing information about the data's freshness.

tables.name: osmosis_lp_gamm_join_pool
tables.description: This table contains information about liquidity pool join transactions on the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into on-chain liquidity and market activity.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transaction was included.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the block was mined.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash identifying the transaction.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The account address that initiated the transaction.

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens involved in the transaction.

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the tokens involved in the transaction.

columns.name: pool_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the liquidity pool involved in the transaction.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: osmosis_message_event_attributes
tables.description: This table provides detailed information about message events from various blockchains in the Cosmos ecosystem, offering insights into transaction activity and network behavior.

columns.name: deprecated_warning
columns.description: A flag indicating whether the field is deprecated and should be used with caution.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the message event was recorded.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the blockchain on which the message event occurred.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the block containing the message event was created.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within which the message event was recorded.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the transaction in which the message event occurred.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within which the event was recorded.

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: The index of the event within the message.

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: The type of event that occurred.

columns.name: attribute_key
columns.description: The key associated with an attribute of the message event.

columns.name: attribute_value
columns.description: The value associated with an attribute of the message event.

columns.name: attribute_index
columns.description: The index of the attribute within the message event.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the message event data was ingested into the database.

tables.name: osmosis_message_events
tables.description: This table contains events from blockchains within the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into network activity and behavior.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the event was recorded.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block was created.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: A unique identifier for the transaction containing the event.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: The index of the event within the message.

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: The category or type of event that occurred.

columns.name: event_attributes
columns.description: Additional information about the event, such as sender, recipient, or amount transferred.

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: The version of the schema used to ingest the data.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: osmosis_message_senders
tables.description: This table contains information about message senders from various blockchains in the Cosmos ecosystem. It provides a detailed overview of the message sending activities.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the message was sent.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block in which the message was sent.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction that sent the message.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction in the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message in the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action in the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address that sent the message.

columns.name: action
columns.description: The type of action performed by the message.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: osmosis_pools_liquidity
tables.description: This table provides a minute-by- minute snapshot of liquidity pools in the Cosmos ecosystem, enabling analysis of market dynamics and trends. The data covers various liquidity pools, offering insights into their performance and evolution over time.

columns.name: minute
columns.description: Timestamp representing the minute at which the liquidity pool data was recorded.

columns.name: pool_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each liquidity pool, allowing for tracking of individual pools across time.

columns.name: liquidity_per_token
columns.description: The total liquidity per token in a given pool, providing insight into the pool's overall liquidity.

columns.name: usdc_liquidity
columns.description: The liquidity in USDC, a stablecoin, within a given pool, enabling analysis of USDC's presence in the market.

columns.name: pool_shares
columns.description: The total number of shares in a given pool, indicating the pool's size and dynamics.

tables.name: osmosis_pools_volume
tables.description: The pools_volume table contains minute-by-minute data of USD Coin (USDC) volume across various pools within the Cosmos ecosystem. This dataset provides insights into the liquidity and trading activity of USDC across different pools.

columns.name: minute
columns.description: Time in minutes, representing the timestamp when the volume data was recorded.

columns.name: pool_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for a specific pool within the Cosmos ecosystem.

columns.name: usdc_volume
columns.description: Total volume of USD Coin (USDC) traded across the pool within the recorded minute.

tables.name: osmosis_redelegate
tables.description: This table contains information about redelegations in the Cosmos ecosystem. It lists all redelegations made across different validators, including the source and destination validators, as well as the amount of tokens redelegated.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Height of the block in which the redelegation transaction occurred.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of the block in which the redelegation transaction occurred.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: Hash of the transaction that initiated the redelegation.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: Index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: Index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: Index of the action within the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: Address of the validator that initiated the redelegation.

columns.name: src_validator
columns.description: Address of the validator from which tokens were redelegated.

columns.name: dst_validator
columns.description: Address of the validator to which tokens were redelegated.

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: Amount of tokens redelegated.

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: Denomination of the tokens redelegated.

columns.name: completion_time
columns.description: Timestamp when the redelegation was completed.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the redelegation data was ingested into the database.

tables.name: osmosis_sends
tables.description: This table tracks transactions sent across the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into blockchain activity and token movements. It captures key details from block data and transaction records.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transaction was included, serving as a unique identifier for the block.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block containing the transaction was created, indicating the time of the transaction.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: A unique identifier assigned to the transaction, allowing for tracking and verification of the transaction's integrity.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction, identifying the specific message sent in the transaction.

columns.name: nth_action
columns.description: The action or instruction taken within the transaction, describing the type of action performed.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the account that initiated the transaction, identifying the sender of the tokens.

columns.name: recipient
columns.description: The address of the account that received the tokens in the transaction, identifying the recipient.

columns.name: tokens_amount
columns.description: The quantity of tokens transferred during the transaction, specifying the amount of tokens moved.

columns.name: tokens_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the tokens transferred, indicating the type of token (e.g., ATOM, BNB, etc.).

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system, indicating the time of data capture.

tables.name: osmosis_superfluid_staking
tables.description: This table provides information about the staking activities in the superfluid Cosmos ecosystem. It contains data on transactions and actions involving staking pools and users.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transaction was included.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block in which the transaction was included.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the transaction.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message in the transaction.

columns.name: nth_action
columns.description: The type of action performed in the transaction (e.g., 'stake', 'unstake', etc.).

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the sender who initiated the transaction.

columns.name: pool_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the staking pool involved in the transaction.

columns.name: amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens staked or unstaked in the transaction.

columns.name: bonding_days
columns.description: The number of days for which the staked tokens are bonded.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the transaction data was ingested into the database.

tables.name: osmosis_swaps
tables.description: Swap events in the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into asset exchanges between users. This data helps analyze trading patterns and market trends within the network.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in the Cosmos blockchain where the swap occurred.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block in the Cosmos blockchain where the swap occurred.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: No description available

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: No description available

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: No description available

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: No description available

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the user who initiated the swap.

columns.name: token_amount_in
columns.description: No description available

columns.name: token_denom_in
columns.description: No description available

columns.name: token_amount_out
columns.description: No description available

columns.name: token_denom_out
columns.description: No description available

columns.name: pool_id
columns.description: No description available

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the swap event was ingested into the system.

tables.name: osmosis_transactions
tables.description: Cosmos Ecosystem Blockchain Transactions. This table contains information about all transactions occurring across various chains in the Cosmos ecosystem.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The block height at which the transaction was processed.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: The ID of the blockchain on which the transaction occurred.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the transaction.

columns.name: tx_info
columns.description: Additional information about the transaction.

columns.name: tx_log_message
columns.description: A log message related to the transaction.

columns.name: fee
columns.description: The fee paid for the transaction.

columns.name: tx_code
columns.description: The transaction code or result.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within a block.

columns.name: gas_used
columns.description: The amount of gas used during the transaction.

columns.name: gas_wanted
columns.description: The amount of gas requested for the transaction.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the transaction was ingested.

columns.name: memo
columns.description: A memo or note associated with the transaction.

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: The version of the schema used to process the transaction.

columns.name: fee_coins
columns.description: The coins used to pay the transaction fee.

columns.name: fee_granter
columns.description: The account that granted the transaction fee.

columns.name: fee_payer
columns.description: The account that paid the transaction fee.

columns.name: gas_limit
columns.description: The maximum amount of gas the transaction was allowed to use.

columns.name: single_sign_mode
columns.description: Whether the transaction was processed in single sign mode.

columns.name: multi_sign_json
columns.description: JSON data related to multi- sign transactions.

columns.name: timeout_height
columns.description: The block height at which the transaction was timed out.

tables.name: osmosis_tx_messages
tables.description: This table contains a collection of transactions from various blockchains within the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into the blockchain activity over time.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transaction was included.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the blockchain on which the transaction occurred.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the transaction.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: message_type
columns.description: The type of message within the transaction.

columns.name: message
columns.description: The actual message within the transaction.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the transaction data was ingested into the database.

tables.name: osmosis_undelegate
tables.description: This table provides a detailed view of undelegation events on Cosmos chain, offering insights into validator redelegation and token movement.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block where the undelegation event occurred.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block where the undelegation event occurred.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction containing the undelegation event.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction containing the undelegation event within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message containing the undelegation event within the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action containing the undelegation event within the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The account that initiated the undelegation event.

columns.name: validator
columns.description: The validator that was redelegated from by the undelegation event.

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens redelegated from the validator.

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the tokens redelegated from the validator.

columns.name: completion_time
columns.description: The time at which the undelegation event is expected to be completed.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when this data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: osmosis_validators
tables.description: This table lists the active and inactive validators in the Cosmos ecosystem, providing essential information for validators and users to make informed decisions.

columns.name: operator_address
columns.description: The address associated with the validator's operator.

columns.name: account_address
columns.description: The address of the validator, which is used for account management and custody.

columns.name: consensus_pubkey
columns.description: The public key used by the validator for consensus and vote casting.

columns.name: jailed
columns.description: A flag indicating whether the validator is currently jailed, meaning it is temporarily unable to participate in the network.

columns.name: status
columns.description: The current status of the validator, including active, unbonding, or jailed.

columns.name: tokens
columns.description: The total amount of tokens staked by the validator.

columns.name: moniker
columns.description: The human- readable name or identifier for the validator.

columns.name: identity
columns.description: The identity key of the validator, used for key management and verification.

columns.name: website
columns.description: The validator's official website or contact information.

columns.name: security_contact
columns.description: The contact information for the validator's security team.

columns.name: details
columns.description: Additional details or notes about the validator.

columns.name: unbonding_height
columns.description: The block height at which the validator's unbonding period begins.

columns.name: unbonding_time
columns.description: The duration of the validator's unbonding period.

columns.name: commission_rate
columns.description: The current commission rate charged by the validator.

columns.name: commission_max_rate
columns.description: The maximum commission rate that the validator can charge.

columns.name: commission_max_change_rate
columns.description: The rate at which the validator's commission rate can change.

columns.name: commission_update_time
columns.description: The block height at which the validator's commission rate was last updated.

columns.name: min_self_delegation
columns.description: The minimum amount of tokens that validators must self-delegate.

columns.name: snapshot_height
columns.description: The block height at which the validator's snapshot was taken.

columns.name: snapshot_time
columns.description: The timestamp at which the validator's snapshot was taken.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the validator's data was ingested and recorded.

tables.name: osmosis_vote
tables.description: This table contains voting data from the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into proposals and their outcomes. It includes details about the voting process and the entities involved.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the vote was recorded, indicating the chronological order of votes.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block in which the vote was recorded, showing when the vote was processed.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: A unique identifier for the transaction that contains the vote, allowing for tracking of vote- related activities.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within a block, providing a way to identify and track transactions.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within a transaction, enabling the identification of specific votes.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within a message, facilitating the isolation of vote-related actions.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The entity that initiated the vote, such as a validator or a user, indicating who is responsible for the vote.

columns.name: proposal_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the proposal being voted on, enabling tracking of proposal-related activities.

columns.name: option
columns.description: The specific option or choice made by the sender in the vote, indicating their preference or stance.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the vote data was ingested into the system, providing an audit trail for data processing.

tables.name: osmosis_withdraw_rewards
tables.description: This table contains information about validator rewards withdrawal events on the Cosmos ecosystem. It provides details about the block and transaction context, as well as the validator and recipient involved in the withdrawal.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the withdrawal event occurred.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block in which the withdrawal event occurred.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the transaction that initiated the withdrawal.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message that triggered the withdrawal event within the transaction.

columns.name: nth_action
columns.description: The specific action taken in the withdrawal event (e.g., withdrawing rewards).

columns.name: validator
columns.description: The validator who initiated the withdrawal.

columns.name: moniker
columns.description: The moniker of the validator who initiated the withdrawal.

columns.name: receiver
columns.description: The account that received the withdrawn rewards.

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens withdrawn from the validator's account.

columns.name: token_amount_in_usdc
columns.description: The amount of the withdrawn tokens converted to USDC.

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the withdrawn tokens (e.g., ATOM, LUNA).

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the withdrawal event was ingested into the datasource.
